application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1. Leylandii Cypress, Fell - As requested suggested works are too: Fell to ground level by sectional take down and grind out stump. T2-T3 Eucalyptus, Crown Reduction - In order to shape and contain suggested works are too reduce and reshape crown all round (height and spread) by up to 3 meters. Estimated height and spread upon completion of works: 5 meters tall and 3 meters wide G2. Leylandii Cypress and Cherry Laurel, (Hedge) Reduce height of hedge approx. 1 metre/s and trim lateral growth (both sides of hedge), creating flat top and sides. Estimated height and spread upon completion of works: 2 meters tall and 4 meters wide T4. Leylandii Cypress, Reduce lateral growth overhanging adjacent garage roof by up to 4 meters and trim garden side lightly to shape and contain. Estimated height and spread upon completion of works: 7 meters tall and 4 meters wide  T5. Leylandii Cypress, Fell - As requested suggested works are too: Fell to ground level by sectional take down T6. Leylandii Cypress, Fell - As requested suggested works are too: Fell to ground level by sectional take down T7-T8. Bay, South corner of rear garden. Trim hard all round to shape and contain. Estimated height and spread upon completion of works: 3 meters tall and 2 meters wide T9. Apple, Fell - As requested suggested works are too: Fell to ground level by sectional take down and grind out stumpT10. Bay, Fell - As requested suggested works are too: Fell to ground level by sectional take down and grind out stump.
